tasks.label: Open App in iPhone Simulator
tasks.command: open -a Simulator && sleep 3 && xcrun simctl openurl booted http://localhost:5173

tasks.label: List iPhone Simulators
tasks.command: xcrun simctl list devices available | grep iPhone

tasks.label: Boot iPhone 15 Pro
tasks.command: xcrun simctl boot 'iPhone 15 Pro' 2>/dev/null || echo 'Simulator already booted or not found'

tasks.label: List Android Emulators
tasks.command: emulator -list-avds 2>/dev/null || echo 'Android emulator not found. Install Android Studio first.'

tasks.label: Check Android Devices
tasks.command: adb devices 2>/dev/null || echo 'adb not found. Install Android Studio or SDK Platform Tools.'

tasks.label: Forward Port to Android Phone
tasks.command: adb reverse tcp:5173 tcp:5173 && echo 'Port forwarded! Open Chrome on phone: http://localhost:5173'
